content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 24 Aug 2019There are a few Robo-Advisors platforms in Singapore, which one is cheaper in terms of cost & better past return performance? Thanks!?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Sin Ting So, Head Of Client Experience at EndowusLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 26 Aug 2019Hello! Sin Ting here from Endowus. We publish the historical returns of our model portfolios and how we invest here(https://endowus.com/how-we-investbelieve in transparency). We focus our efforts on building data-driven portfolios, and the historical returns are based on real track records of the funds rather than back-tested data. You can also see our fees here. Hope this helps in evaluating your various investment options in Singapore! If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to my team at support@endowus.com.1 comment2

Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 26 Aug 2019Hi! You can check out the fee comparison here:https://dollarsandsense.sg/complete-cost-guide-robo-advisor-fees-singapore-investors/. Past performance is harder to quantify since there are different risk profiles to choose from and many such services are new and hence unable to qualify for the 5-year test. That being said, you can take a look at StashAway's past 2 years performance on their website.0 comments2
